TopicTitle: The New and Better K drive

Articles.Content:
The KraKen drive is something that many players cherish, but understand that it is long lost. It is also common knowledge that pushing on a SEPARATE VESSEL creates force. But this glitch has not been stabilized to be useable. I decided to use trial and error and stabilized the technology to be used as almost a thruster. It is still pretty unstable, due to the 32 g it put out under my tests. This makes it prone to turning, and have a high chance of failing, exploding, or even ripping your vessel to shreds. But opportunity is in store for the long lost kraken drive.

imgur: http://imgur.com/gallery/9kR8j

Download: https://kerbalx.com/322997am/k-drive-1

PS: i beat the record for the highest g's achieved with a k drive
There is hope for the Kraken Drive!? WOOO!

15 minutes ago, Bill the Kerbal said:

There is hope for the Kraken Drive!? WOOO!

There is hope. And the thing is, I made many prototypes, but this one is by far the most stable and powerful. The one behind it is 19.5g.
